snippet.title: The Great SALVAGE HUNT! | ASTRONEER 0.9 gameplay ep 3
snippet.description:
More Astroneer 0.9 gameplay! We take out a chain of rovers looking for wrecks old and new, finding salvage galore!
► Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser

Watch Astroneer 0.9 ep 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V3mVPhPKvew

Watch all Astroneer gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u7OmYQZWS0Q&index=1&list=PLLvo6-XrH1flbcIC5q4PvznqIMEVXYudf

In this let's play Astroneer 0.9 gameplay video for the July 2018 update, we check out shredders, exo wrecks, trade changes and scrap, as well as the usual base building!

In episode 3, we dedicate our time to roaming the world in our rovers, looking for stuff to salvage, finding wrecks old and new. We find a lot of familiar but broken stuff, including drop pods and platforms, occasionally finding working equipment too.

Watch all our Astroneer videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1flbcIC5q4PvznqIMEVXYudf

Buy Astroneer game download on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/361420/ASTRONEER/

=====

Official Astroneer Basebuilding update gameplay info:

"Astroneer is set during a 25th century gold rush where players must explore the frontiers of outer space, risking their lives in harsh environments for the chance of striking it rich. 

On this adventure, a player’s most useful tool is their ability to shape their world, altering the terrain and extracting valuable resources from planets, and moons. Resources can be traded or crafted into new tools, vehicles, and modules to create everything from massive industrial bases to mobile rover bases."

Developed by: System Era Softworks 
Version played: alpha 0.9.0
Formats available: PC Windows, Xbox One

Official site: https://astroneer.space/

=====

Thanks for watching this let's play Astroneer 0.9 gameplay video! More from Randomise User, home of the best indie games:

► Subscribe to Randomise User: http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser
► Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/QJkaaeE
► Buy Randomise User merch: https://shop.spreadshirt.co.uk/RandomiseUser/

► Watch Let's Play one-offs for the best new games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fnvqfQI4mhyXJu5Y7hcS5vC
► Watch Alpha Soup for early first impressions: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1flWq5KRBP8GhUqcGxJT5cPB
